titleStmt.title: The declaration and protestation agreed upon by the grand iury at the assizes held for the county of VVorcester, the third day of August. 1642 and assented unto by the high sheriffe, the Lord Coventry, the baronets, knights, justices of the peace, gentlemen and freeholders of the county of VVorcester aforesaid.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Majestie: and by the assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: In favor of the King. -- Thomason Catalogue.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
